biography_text: BRAUN, Michael, a Senator from Indiana; born in Jasper, Ind., March 24, 1954; graduated Jasper High School, 1972; B.A., economics, Wabash College, 1976; M.B.A., Harvard Business School, 1978; company founder and chief executive officer; member of the Indiana house of representatives 2014-2017; elected as a Republican to the United States Senate in 2018 for the term ending January 3, 2025.
